tachyon.worker.block.allocator

Interface Allocator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GreedyAllocator, MaxFreeAllocator, RoundRobinAllocator

    @PublicApi
public interface Allocator
    Interface for the allocation policy of Tachyon managed data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Allocator.Factory 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StorageDirView allocateBlockWithView(long sessionId, long blockSize, BlockStoreLocation location, BlockMetadataManagerView view)
      Allocates a block from the given block store location under a given view.

    • Method Detail

      • allocateBlockWithView

        StorageDirView allocateBlockWithView(long sessionId,
                                   long blockSize,
                                   BlockStoreLocation location,
                                   BlockMetadataManagerView view)
        Allocates a block from the given block store location under a given view. The location can be a specific location, or BlockStoreLocation.anyTier() or BlockStoreLocation.anyDirInTier(int). The view is generated by a tachyon.worker.block.BlockStore.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of session to apply for the block allocation
        blockSize - the size of block in bytes
        location - the location in block store
        view - of the metadata manager
        Returns:
        a StorageDirView in which to create the temp block meta if success, null otherwise
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if block location is invalid
